attributes.action: Allow Scotland to choose their own future
attributes.additional_details:
If anyone else saw the statistics in the votes that were for staying in the EU, you would have noticed that there was a strong number of Scots that voted to stay, Actually in a way the whole country did. 
Scotland. Leave 38.0% 1,018,322 VOTES. 
                Remain 62.0% 1,661,191 VOTES.
attributes.background: With Nicola Sturgeon going forward with plans for the second referendum, there's been some individuals trying to prevent it from happening.
